item.title: CVE-2024-21752|2024-02-29T05:17:57.694Z -- Ernest Marcinko -- Ajax Search Lite
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Ernest Marcinko Ajax Search Lite allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Ajax Search Lite: from n/a through 4.11.4.
